sentences.en: Floodwaters were also reportedly moving southwards towards Punjab and Sindh provinces.
sentences.cn: 有报导说,洪水正在朝着南部的旁遮普省和信德省方向移动.

sentences.en: It was a visit that took him to Mogadishu and southwards to Kismayo.
sentences.cn: 由于一次访问的缘故，他来到了摩加迪沙，又向南来到基斯马尤。

sentences.en: Ten of thousands of men, year after year, have travelled southwards to find work.
sentences.cn: 每年都有好几万人去南方找工作.

sentences.en: Tens of thousands of men, year after year, have travelled southwards to find work.
sentences.cn: 每年有数万人到南方去找工作.

sentences.en: The army may push southwards into the Kurdish areas.
sentences.cn: 军队可能南下向库尔德地区挺进。

sentences.en: The most northerly races have to be transferred southwards.
sentences.cn: 最北的种族有必要南移.

sentences.en: The surge travelled southwards along the coast.
sentences.cn: 浪涛沿着海岸向南涌去.

sentences.en: The Yellow River slid swiftly and steadily southwards , its swollen surface a vast expanse of white.
sentences.cn: 黄河平稳地向南迅速滑行着, 仿佛凸起的水面白茫茫的.

sentences.en: These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟春天向北迁徙,秋天向南迁徙.

sentences.en: We drove southwards from Manchester to London.
sentences.cn: 我们由曼彻斯特向南开车到了伦敦.

sentences.en: We must southwards ( travel towards the south ) to get to the South Pole.
sentences.cn: 要到南极去我们必须朝南走.
